name: drunk as i like: gensokyo drinking attitude (sega mega drive/genesis)
name_original: drunk as i like: gensokyo drinking attitude (sega mega drive/genesis)
description:
an original touhou fangame for the NTSC sega genesis/megadrive
made in under 3 days for touhou fan game jam 7 2021-11-25 thru 2021-11-28

50 laid-back stages of drinking and drunk-eating and drunk-drinking in the style of robotron 2048

the golden age of never-ending arcade alcoholism
now is time to the 68000 beer on draught

controls:
    d-pad: move suika
    a: shoot
    b: strafe/lock shot angle
    start: pause

t. boddy: everything
st petersburg, florida, usa, 2021

touhou and its characters, music, etc. copyright ZUN
blastem emulator by mike pavone: retrodev.com/repos/blastem

gameplay tips
 stages have dueling objectives: get the sushi, take out the drinks -- stages end when there's no more alcohol. try to grab all the sushi on each stage to gain points and earn extra players.

beer: follows you around, slow and dumb. take your time and worry about these last.
wine: wanders aimlessly and fires off deadly homing shots. get rid of asap!
martini: even more dangerous than wine, fires reflecting shots that will make things difficult if not dealt with.
old pickle: hulking, indestructible turret -- can't be killed, but can be pushed out of the way by shooting. learn to predict their timing in order to get past them.
lantern: harmless, stationary blocks that block you and your bullets. you can take them out to get a clear line of sight, but they are resilient.
sake barrel: appears every five stages, take out this boss as it saunters across the playfield while dodging its unique spell cards.
